Articles.Content: So one day, I encountered the annoying bug where buttons do not work while I was in flight. If this happens, land, try to get in the air without using engines and then quickly press quit to main menu which now works. When you go back into your save, the glitch is gone. This only works when in flight.
Modded or unmodded? Are you sure your craft didn't simply run out of electricity?

no and can happen modded or unmodded. it also happens in space center view but idk how to fix in space center view,

Edited January 11, 2021 by Rocketry101

I do get this sometimes.  It often means i cant throttle down, but i can turn off the engine from the PAW.  

I put it down to a mechanical failure.  But yes, an exit and return fixes the issue.

Peace.
Maybe it's an "input lock" problem. In the Windows version, press alt-f12 for the debug/cheat window, pick Input Lock from the left menu, then click the Clear Input Locks button.
